complaint_text:
I purchased the OmniStream 4K Pro hub last month hoping it would solve my connectivity problems, but it has been a nightmare of technical glitches from day one. 
Initially, the installation process was smooth, but as soon as I tried to bridge it with my existing mesh network, the device started power cycling randomly. 
I checked the event logs, and it keeps throwing a 'Error 505: Gateway Timeout' every time I attempt a firmware update. 
I’ve tried resetting it to factory settings three times, changing the DNS configuration, and even swapping out the CAT6 cables, but the packet loss is still sitting at around 15% during peak hours. To make matters worse, the companion app crashes on Android 14 whenever I try to access the advanced settings to toggle the firewall. This isn't just a user error; there is clearly a bug in the latest patch that conflicts with legacy router protocols. I need a developer to look at my logs or I need a full refund because this hardware is currently serving as an expensive paperweight.

i ordered this package two weeks ago and the tracking hasnt updated since last tuesday i need this for a birthday gift
the delivery was incredibly fast i ordered it yesterday afternoon and it was on my doorstep by am today amazing service
the box arrived a bit crushed on the corner the item inside was fine but the presentation was lacking
driver threw the package over the fence my dog nearly got to it please train your drivers better
it arrived on time but they left it in the rain despite having a covered porch right there validated but annoyed
seamless delivery experience the tracking link was accurate down to the minute thanks
package was marked as delivered but i never received it neighbors dont have it either
standard shipping speed nothing to write home about but it got here safely
arrived a day late which was annoying but at least it wasnt lost
i was doublecharged for this transaction one charge is pending and the other went through please refund the duplicate
the checkout process was super smooth i love that you accept apple pay now made it so much faster
im confused by the invoice there is a service fee listed that wasnt mentioned on the product page
my refund was processed immediately after i cancelled usually companies take days appreciate the speed
why did my subscription renew without a reminder email i wanted to cancel before this month
the price is fair but the currency conversion rate applied seemed a bit high compared to the market rate
hidden fees at the very last step of checkout this is deceptive marketing
receipt generation failed i need a vat invoice for my company expenses and cant find it anywhere
payment went through easily though i wish there were more installment options
the build quality is terrible it fell apart after just one use cheap plastic garbage
honestly this is the best purchase ive made all year the material feels premium and durable
its okay for the price point does the job but dont expect it to last forever
the color is completely different from the photos on the website it looks blue online but its clearly purple
exceeded my expectations the craftsmanship is topnotch and it looks beautiful in my living room
the stitching is a little loose on the hem but otherwise its a decent shirt
stopped working after three days changed the batteries and still nothing returning immediately
perfect fit and finish exactly what i was looking for
smells weirdly like chemicals right out of the box had to air it out for two days
the customer service agent sarah was an absolute angel she resolved my complex issue in minutes
i sat on hold for minutes just to be disconnected this is the worst support i have ever experienced
the representative was polite but didnt really have the authority to fix my problem they had to escalate it
chatbot is useless it keeps looping the same three answers let me talk to a human
incredibly helpful team they even followed up via email to make sure everything was working
support is slow to respond but they eventually solved the issue just be patient
rude the agent basically told me it was my fault and refused to listen to the explanation
fastest resolution ever i used the text support and was done in minutes
they promised a callback within hours its been three days and i havent heard a peep
the app crashes every time i try to filter by size its completely unusable on android
love the new dark mode on the website much easier on the eyes during late night shopping
the search bar is a bit laggy it takes a few seconds to populate results but it works
cannot reset my password the forgot password link leads to a error page
super intuitive interface i found exactly what i needed without having to dig through menus
website is okay on desktop but the mobile version is a formatting nightmare text overlaps images
the update fixed the login bug but now the notifications are not coming through properly
great user experience ux design very clean and responsive
i really appreciate the companys commitment to sustainability it makes me want to buy more
way too many marketing emails i signed up for one thing and now my inbox is flooded
its a decent brand nothing spectacular but reliable enough for basics
disappointed with the lack of variety in the new collection feels very repetitive
the loyalty program is actually worth it ive already earned a free item
i wish you had a physical store nearby so i could see items in person
the driver refused to carry the box up the stairs i live on the second floor and am disabled
lightning fast i ordered at noon and it was here by dinner time unbelievable
the tracking map showed the truck in my neighborhood for hours but it never stopped
box was wet on the bottom luckily the item inside was wrapped in plastic so it survived
they delivered to the wrong house my neighbor had to bring it over to me
standard delivery timeframe no issues but nothing special to report
i paid extra for gift wrapping and it arrived in a plain brown box refund please
the courier was so polite and waited for me to answer the door great service
package was smashed it looked like someone stepped on it
i was charged twice for the same subscription please reverse the second transaction immediately
the new pay later feature is fantastic makes managing my budget much easier
i dont understand why there is a foreign transaction fee i thought you were a local company
refund took business days a bit slower than id like but it did arrive
checkout page froze after i entered my card details i was scared id be charged without an order
pricing is competitive i compared it with three other sites and you were the cheapest
why cant i remove my credit card info from the account there is no delete button
invoice downloaded perfectly clear layout and easy to understand for my tax filing
the zippers on this backpack are very cheap one jammed on the first day
this is hands down the most comfortable mattress i have ever slept on
it works but the motor is louder than i expected okay for the garage not the house
the material is thin and seethrough not at all like the picture
absolute junk it broke into pieces when i dropped it on a carpeted floor
beautiful finish and sturdy construction worth every penny
the screen has a dead pixel in the corner its small but annoying for a new device
decent quality for a budget item you get what you pay for
customer service hung up on me while i was explaining the problem so rude
the support team is worldclass they solved a problem i thought was impossible
i waited minutes for a live chat agent response time needs improvement
the agent gave me the wrong return address now my package is lost in the mail
friendly staff although they had to put me on hold a few times to check policies
automated phone system is a nightmare i just want to speak to a person
they refused my warranty claim because i didnt have the original box very strict
got a reply within an hour on a sunday impressive availability
the website keeps crashing when i try to open the my orders page
the mobile app is so smooth i love the oneclick reorder feature
images arent loading on the product page i cant see what im buying
search function is okay but the sorting options are a bit limited
i keep getting logged out every minutes please fix the session timeout
very clean layout i found the specs sheet immediately
the font color is too light against the white background hard to read
links in the footer are broken they lead to pages
i really like the new ecofriendly initiative good job reducing plastic
stop spamming my phone with sms offers i never consented to this
its an average brand reliable enough but nothing exciting
disappointed that you removed the wishlist feature i used that all the time
great community vibe on your social media love the engagement
inventory levels seem low lately lots of out of stock labels
i wish you offered international shipping to canada
the rebranding is ugly the old logo was much more professional
highly recommended i tell all my colleagues to shop here
